WorkItem.Description:
With the Theme ExpressionDark the content controls the Expander are not displayed in the designer view.
I can change the background color and see the control container of the expander but not the controls in it.
However all the controls are displayed correctly at runtime.
 
I have only test it with VS2010 SP1 (Version 10.0.40219.1 SP1Rel) and ExpressionDark theme.
(and the solution is a WPF application)
 
 
Here is a code sample to reproduce the issue :
 
<Window x:Class="MyTestAppli.Windows.tst"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        Title="tst" Height="405" Width="673">
    <Grid>
        <Expander Header="Test expander" ExpandDirection="Down">
            <StackPanel>
               <StackPanel>
                <CheckBox Content="Option 1" />
                <CheckBox Content="Option 2" />
                <CheckBox Content="Option 3" />
            </StackPanel>
            </StackPanel>
        </Expander>
    </Grid>
</Window>
WorkItem.Summary: Expander doesn't display it's content in designer view
